intro: I focus on solving problems and implmenenting the solution!
I am a versitile full-stack developer that really enjoys working from one end to another, very capable of adapting the tasks, needs which accept challenges without hesitation.

I focus on details as much as I like to grasp the big picture of the solution, and my native curiousity enables me to constantly seek knowledge to aim for the best results. I prefer to work with colleagues that enjoy knowledge sharing and open to opinions. I am good at communication and share enthusiasm and passion in a environment I feel comfortable.
